CustomField.description: This field represents an Advanced Option for a filter. Advanced Options in filters allow you to build up filtering conditions that use a mixture of AND and OR boolean operators across multiple filter line items. For example, (1 AND 2) OR 3 finds records that match both the first two filter line items or the third.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field represents an Advanced Option for a filter. Advanced Options in filters allow you to build up filtering conditions that use a mixture of AND and OR boolean operators across multiple filter line items. For example, (1 AND 2) OR 3 etc.
CustomField.label: Boolean Filter
